# set up

```{r}
#| label: set up chunk
# reading in packages
library(tidyverse) # general use for data wrangling, cleaning, etc. 
library(lterdatasampler) # package witj LTER data sets 

data("pie_crab") # extracting pie crab data set from lterdatasampler 

```

# Exploratory Visulaization 

```{r}
#| label: latitude size plot

ggplot(data = pie_crab,
       aes(x = latitude, 
           y = size )) + 
  geom_point()
```
